verses.text: Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against it,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto it, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, O \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, I \add am\add* against thee, and I will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against thee, and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w most|strong="H4923"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*.\f + \fr 35.3 \ft most…: Heb. desolation and desolation\f*

I will \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*, and thou shalt be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Because thou hast had a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w hatred|strong="H0342"\w*, and hast \w shed|strong="H5064"\w* \add the blood of\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by the \w force|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w*, in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that their\add* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \add had\add* an \w end|strong="H7093"\w*:\f + \fr 35.5 \ft perpetual…: or, hatred of old\f*\f + \fr 35.5 \ft shed…: Heb. poured out the children\f*\f + \fr 35.5 \ft force: Heb. hands\f*

Therefore, \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, I will \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* thee unto \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* thee: \w sith|strong="H0518"\w* thou hast not \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, even \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* thee.

Thus will I \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w most|strong="H8077"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from it him that passeth \w out|strong="H5674"\w* and him that \w returneth|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 35.7 \ft most…: Heb. desolation and desolation\f*

And I will \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* his \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* with his \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \add men:\add* in thy \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, and in thy \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w*, and in all thy \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w*, shall they \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* that are \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w desolations|strong="H8077"\w*, and thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Because thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, These \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and these \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* shall be mine, and we will \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it; whereas the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was there:\f + \fr 35.10 \ft whereas…: or, though the \+nd LORD\+nd* was there\f*

Therefore, \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, I will even \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and according to thine \w envy|strong="H7068"\w* which thou hast \w used|strong="H6213"\w* out of thy \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* against them; and I will make myself \w known|strong="H3045"\w* among them, when I have \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* thee.

And thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and that\add* I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* all thy \w blasphemies|strong="H5007"\w* which thou hast \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* against the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, They are laid \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, they are \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us to \w consume|strong="H0402"\w*.\f + \fr 35.12 \ft to consume: Heb. to devour\f*

Thus with your \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* ye have \w boasted|strong="H1431"\w* against me, and have \w multiplied|strong="H6280"\w* your \w words|strong="H1697"\w* against me: I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add*.\f + \fr 35.13 \ft boasted: Heb. magnified\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; When the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H8055"\w*, I will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*.

As thou didst \w rejoice|strong="H8057"\w* at the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because it was \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, so will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee: thou shalt be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, O \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, and all \w Idumea|strong="H0123"\w*, \add even\add* all of it: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
